hostOSInfo.name: hostOSInfo
hostOSInfo.description: Operating System description where SNMP agent is running.

agentModuleVersion.name: agentModuleVersion
agentModuleVersion.description: The module version in xx.yy format. Where xx is the major version number and yy is the minor version number(without build information).

adpNumber.name: adpNumber
adpNumber.description: The total no of SAS adapters present.

adapterPropertiesTable.name: adapterPropertiesTable
adapterPropertiesTable.description: A List of adapter Entries containing Information/Properties about the adapters.

adapterPropertiesEntry.name: adapterPropertiesEntry
adapterPropertiesEntry.description: An Entry in the adapter table.

alarmState.name: alarmState
alarmState.description: Alarm is enabled(1) or disabled(0) on this adapter.

cacheFlushInterval.name: cacheFlushInterval
cacheFlushInterval.description: Cache flush interval in seconds for this adapter.

clusterState.name: clusterState
clusterState.description: Cluster is enabled(1) or disabled(0) on this adapter.

predFailPollInterval.name: predFailPollInterval
predFailPollInterval.description: Number of seconds between predictive fail polls on this adapter.

intThrottleCount.name: intThrottleCount
intThrottleCount.description: Interrupt throttle active count on this adapter.

intThrottleTimeUs.name: intThrottleTimeUs
intThrottleTimeUs.description: Interrupt throttle completion hold time on this adapter.

patrolReadRate.name: patrolReadRate
patrolReadRate.description: Patrol Read Rate for this adapter.

bgiRate.name: bgiRate
bgiRate.description: Background initialization rate for this adapter.

ccRate.name: ccRate
ccRate.description: Consistency Check rate on this Adapter.

spinupDelay.name: spinupDelay
spinupDelay.description: Number of seconds to delay among spinup groups for this adapter.

spinupDriveCount.name: spinupDriveCount
spinupDriveCount.description: Maximum number of drives to spin up at one time for this adapter.

disableBatteryWarning.name: disableBatteryWarning
disableBatteryWarning.description: disable/enable warnings for missing battery or missing HW status. 1->Disable , 0->Enable

multipathSupport.name: multipathSupport
multipathSupport.description: Multipath is supported or not supported on this adapter.Values: not supported(0),supported(1)

ssdSMARTerEnabled.name: ssdSMARTerEnabled
ssdSMARTerEnabled.description: Copyback to SSD on SMART error. Values Enabled(0),Disabled(1)

sasAddr.name: sasAddr
sasAddr.description: This field gives the controller SAS address

adapterInfoTable.name: adapterInfoTable
adapterInfoTable.description: A List of adapter Entries containing Information/Properties about the adapters.

adapterInfoEntry.name: adapterInfoEntry
adapterInfoEntry.description: An Entry in the adapterInfo table.

vendorId.name: vendorId
vendorId.description: PCI Vendor ID for this Adapter.

devId.name: devId
devId.description: PCI Device ID for this Adapter.

subVendorID.name: subVendorID
subVendorID.description: PCI Sub-Vendor ID for this adapter.

subDevID.name: subDevID
subDevID.description: PCI Sub-Device ID for this adapter.

hostInterface.name: hostInterface
hostInterface.description: Host interface information for this adapter. Values are as follows: N/A(0), PCIX(1), PCIE(2), iSCSI(3), SAS_3G(4)

devInterface.name: devInterface
devInterface.description: Multiple device interface support values separated by space.

devInterfacePortCnt.name: devInterfacePortCnt
devInterfacePortCnt.description: Device Port Count on this adapter.

nvramSize.name: nvramSize
nvramSize.description: NVRAM size in KB for this adapter.A value -1 for invalid or undefined size.

memorySize.name: memorySize
memorySize.description: Memory size in MB for this adapter.A value -1 for invalid or undefined size.

flashSize.name: flashSize
flashSize.description: Flash size in MB for this adapter.A value -1 for invalid or undefined size.

vdPresentCount.name: vdPresentCount
vdPresentCount.description: Virtual devices present in this adapter.

vdDegradedCount.name: vdDegradedCount
vdDegradedCount.description: Number of virtual devices in this adapter that are critical

vdOfflineCount.name: vdOfflineCount
vdOfflineCount.description: Number of virtual devices in this adapter that are offline

pdPresentCount.name: pdPresentCount
pdPresentCount.description: Physical devices present in this adapter.

pdDiskPresentCount.name: pdDiskPresentCount
pdDiskPresentCount.description: Physical disk devices present in this adapter.

pdDiskPredFailureCount.name: pdDiskPredFailureCount
pdDiskPredFailureCount.description: Number of disk devices in this adapter that are critical

pdDiskFailedCount.name: pdDiskFailedCount
pdDiskFailedCount.description: Number of disk devices in this adapter that are failed

clusterStatus.name: clusterStatus
clusterStatus.description: Cluster state on this adapter. Values: ACTIVE(1), INACTIVE(0)

devInterfaceType.name: devInterfaceType
devInterfaceType.description: Type of the interface of the IR adapter. Values: GEN1(0), GEN2(1)

adapterSupportInfoTable.name: adapterSupportInfoTable
adapterSupportInfoTable.description: A List of Entries containing Properties supported by the Controller.

adapterSupportInfoEntry.name: adapterSupportInfoEntry
adapterSupportInfoEntry.description: An Entry in the adapter table.

supportMaxArms.name: supportMaxArms
supportMaxArms.description: Maximum arms per Logical Drive supported for this Adapter.

supportMaxSpans.name: supportMaxSpans
supportMaxSpans.description: Maximum spans per Logical Drive supported for this Adapter.

supportMaxArrays.name: supportMaxArrays
supportMaxArrays.description: Maximum number arrays supported this Adapter.

supportMaxLDs.name: supportMaxLDs
supportMaxLDs.description: Maximum number of Logical Drive's supported for this Adapter.

supportHardwarePresent.name: supportHardwarePresent
supportHardwarePresent.description: Supported Hardware on this adapter. bbu(1),alarm(2),nvram(3),uart(4). For multiple hardware support a comma delimited list will appear.

supportMaxConcurrentCmds.name: supportMaxConcurrentCmds
supportMaxConcurrentCmds.description: The maximum parallel commands supported on this Adapter.

supportMaxSGECount.name: supportMaxSGECount
supportMaxSGECount.description: The maximum Scatter Gather Element count allowed on this Adapter.

supportMaxRequestSize.name: supportMaxRequestSize
supportMaxRequestSize.description: The maximum data transfer size in sectors, on this Adapter.

supportClusterPermitted.name: supportClusterPermitted
supportClusterPermitted.description: Clustering support on this Adapter. Values: FALSE(0), TRUE(1)

supportSupportsSAS.name: supportSupportsSAS
supportSupportsSAS.description: SAS physical drive support.Values: notSupported(0), supported(1)

supportSupportsSATA.name: supportSupportsSATA
supportSupportsSATA.description: SATA physical drive support.Values: notSupported(0), supported(1)

allowSSDMixInLD.name: allowSSDMixInLD
allowSSDMixInLD.description: allow SAS/SATA SSD mix within an LD. allow(1), not allow(0)

allowMixSSDHDDInLD.name: allowMixSSDHDDInLD
allowMixSSDHDDInLD.description: allow SSD/HDD mix within an LD.allow(1), not allow(0)

adpOperationsSupportInfoTable.name: adpOperationsSupportInfoTable
adpOperationsSupportInfoTable.description: A List of Entries containing operations supported by the Controller.

adpOperationsSupportInfoEntry.name: adpOperationsSupportInfoEntry
adpOperationsSupportInfoEntry.description: An Entry in the adapter table.

rbldRate.name: rbldRate
rbldRate.description: Rebuilding rate change support for this Adapter. Values: False(0), True(1)

suCCRate.name: suCCRate
suCCRate.description: Consistency Check rate change support for this Adapter. Values: False(0), True(1)

suBgiRate.name: suBgiRate
suBgiRate.description: Background initialization rate change support for this adapter. Values: False(0), True(1)

reconRate.name: reconRate
reconRate.description: Reconstruction rate change support for this adapter. Values: False(0), True(1)

patrolRate.name: patrolRate
patrolRate.description: Patrol read rate change support for this adapter. Values: False(0), True(1)

alarmControl.name: alarmControl
alarmControl.description: Alarm control support for this adapter. Values: False(0), True(1)

clusterSupported.name: clusterSupported
clusterSupported.description: Cluster support for this adapter. Values: False(0), True(1)

bbu.name: bbu
bbu.description: BBU support for this adapter. Values: False(0), True(1)

spanningAllowed.name: spanningAllowed
spanningAllowed.description: Spanning support for this adapter. Values: False(0), True(1)

dedicatedHotSpares.name: dedicatedHotSpares
dedicatedHotSpares.description: Dedicated HotSpares for this adapter. Values: False(0), True(1)

revertibleHotSpares.name: revertibleHotSpares
revertibleHotSpares.description: Revertible HotSpares support for this adapter. Values: False(0), True(1)

foreignConfigImport.name: foreignConfigImport
foreignConfigImport.description: Support foreign config import on this adapter. Values: False(0), True(1)

selfDiagnostic.name: selfDiagnostic
selfDiagnostic.description: Controller supports self diagnostic. Values: False(0), True(1)

allowMixedRedundancyOnArray.name: allowMixedRedundancyOnArray
allowMixedRedundancyOnArray.description: Allow different Virtual Disk on the same array to have different redundancy levels Values: False(0), True(1)

globalHotSpares.name: globalHotSpares
globalHotSpares.description: Global hot spares are supported. Values: False(0), True(1)

oceWithNoDriveAddition.name: oceWithNoDriveAddition
oceWithNoDriveAddition.description: Online Capacity Expansion supported. Values: False(0), True(1)

driveOperationSupportTable.name: driveOperationSupportTable
driveOperationSupportTable.description: A List of operations supported by Physical Drive.

driveOperationSupportEntry.name: driveOperationSupportEntry
driveOperationSupportEntry.description: An Entry in the driveOperationSupport table.

forceOnline.name: forceOnline
forceOnline.description: Physical Drive force Online operation support Values: notSupported(0), supported(1)

forceOffline.name: forceOffline
forceOffline.description: Physical Drive force Offline operation support Values: notSupported(0), supported(1)

forceRebuild.name: forceRebuild
forceRebuild.description: Physical Drive force Rebuild operation support Values: notSupported(0), supported(1)

vdOperationSupportTable.name: vdOperationSupportTable
vdOperationSupportTable.description: A List operations supported by Virtual Drive

vdOperationSupportEntry.name: vdOperationSupportEntry
vdOperationSupportEntry.description: An Entry in the vdOperationSupport Table.

readPolicy.name: readPolicy
readPolicy.description: Read policy support. Values: False(0), True(1)

writePolicy.name: writePolicy
writePolicy.description: Write policy support. Values: False(0), True(1)

ioPolicy.name: ioPolicy
ioPolicy.description: IO policy support. Values: False(0), True(1)

accessPolicy.name: accessPolicy
accessPolicy.description: Access policy support. Values: False(0), True(1)

diskCachePolicy.name: diskCachePolicy
diskCachePolicy.description: Disk Cache Policy support. Values: False(0), True(1)

bbuNumber.name: bbuNumber
bbuNumber.description: The present number of rows in the bbuTable.

bbuTable.name: bbuTable
bbuTable.description: A List of bbu Entries containing Information/Properties about the BBU.

bbuEntry.name: bbuEntry
bbuEntry.description: An Entry in the BBU table.

batteryType.name: batteryType
batteryType.description: BBU Type: Values: n/a(0), ibbu(1), bbu(2), zcr_legacy(3), itbbu3(4)

nextLearnTime.name: nextLearnTime
nextLearnTime.description: Time of next scheduled lean cycle (seconds path 1/1/2000)

absStateOfCharge.name: absStateOfCharge
absStateOfCharge.description: Predicted remaining capacity expressed as % of DesignCapacity() (0-100). Value of -1 means not supported

fullChargeCapacity.name: fullChargeCapacity
fullChargeCapacity.description: Predicted pack capacity when it is fully charged in mAh

averageEmptyTime.name: averageEmptyTime
averageEmptyTime.description: One-minute rolling average of the predicted remaining battery life. Value of -1 means not supported

cycleCount.name: cycleCount
cycleCount.description: Number of charge cycles the battery has experienced. Value of -1 means not supported

firmwareStatus.name: firmwareStatus
firmwareStatus.description: condition of battery in following order: packMissing(0/1) voltageLow(0/1) temperatureHigh(0/1) chargeActive(0/1) dischargeActive(0/1) learnCycleRequested(0/1) learnCycleActive(0/1) learnCycleFailed(0/1) learnCycleTimeout(0/1) i2cErrorsDetected(0/1) Only enabled(1) values will be shown

voltage.name: voltage
voltage.description: Accurate battery terminal voltage in mV, resolution of 1mV

autoLearnPeriod.name: autoLearnPeriod
autoLearnPeriod.description: Time (in seconds) between learn cycles (0 to disable auto learn)

relStateOfCharge.name: relStateOfCharge
relStateOfCharge.description: Predicted remaining capacity expressed as % of FullChargeCapacity() (0-100). Value of -1 means not supported

capacityRemain.name: capacityRemain
capacityRemain.description: Predicted charge or energy remaining in the battery in mAh

runTimeToEmpty.name: runTimeToEmpty
runTimeToEmpty.description: (in minutes)Relative gain or loss in remaining life in response to change in power policy. Value of -1 means not supported

avgTimeToFull.name: avgTimeToFull
avgTimeToFull.description: One-minute rolling average of predicted remaining time to full charge. Value of -1 means not supported

errorMargin.name: errorMargin
errorMargin.description: Expected margin of error (%) in charge calculation (2-100). Value of -1 means not supported

chargerStatus.name: chargerStatus
chargerStatus.description: Battery charger status. Values: N/A(-1), off(0), complete(1), progress(2)

adpID.name: adpID
adpID.description: The adapter id where BBU is attached

remainingCapAlarm.name: remainingCapAlarm
remainingCapAlarm.description: Remaining capacity to alarm. Value of -1 means not supported

remainingTimeAlarm.name: remainingTimeAlarm
remainingTimeAlarm.description: Remaining time to alarm. Value of -1 means not supported

bbu_current.name: bbu_current
bbu_current.description: Current(In mA) being supplied (or accepted) through the terminals of the battery

pdNumber.name: pdNumber
pdNumber.description: The present number of rows in the physicalDrive table.

pdTable.name: pdTable
pdTable.description: A List of physicalDrive Entries containing Information/Properties about the drives

pdEntry.name: pdEntry
pdEntry.description: An Entry in the Device Table.

oemSupported.name: oemSupported
oemSupported.description: Drive support by the OEM (OEM-specific checks) Values: notSupported(1), supported(0)

scsiDevType.name: scsiDevType
scsiDevType.description: Type of this Device. Values: disk(0), tape(1), printer(2), processor(3), cdrom(5), scanner(6), optical(7), enclosure(13), dvd(10), unknown(31)

connectedAdapterPort.name: connectedAdapterPort
connectedAdapterPort.description: Adapter port to which the device is connected.

deviceSpeed.name: deviceSpeed
deviceSpeed.description: Maximum supported speed. Values: speed_unknown(0), speed_1p5G(1), speed_3G(2),speed_6G(3)

otherErrCount.name: otherErrCount
otherErrCount.description: other error count of the device

predFailCount.name: predFailCount
predFailCount.description: Predictive fail count of the device

pdState.name: pdState
pdState.description: Firmware's interpretation of drive state. Values: unconfigured_good(0), unconfigured_bad(1), hot_spare(2), offline(16), failed(17), rebuild(20), online(24),copyback(32),system(64)

disabledForRemoval.name: disabledForRemoval
disabledForRemoval.description: If true, drive is ready for removal. Values: false(0), true(1)

linkSpeed.name: linkSpeed
linkSpeed.description: Negotiated link speed. Values: speed_unknown(0), speed_1p5G(1), speed_3G(2), speed_6G(3)

pdSupportFlags.name: pdSupportFlags
pdSupportFlags.description: 1st Byte:forcedPDGUID(0/1),2nd Byte:inVD(0/1),3rd Byte:isGlobalSpare(0/1),4th Byte:isSpare(0/1),5th Byte:isForeign(0/1),6th Byte:intf(0-Unknown, 1-parallel SCSI, 2-SAS, 3-SATA, 4-FC).A comma delimited list will appear.

pdSasAddr.name: pdSasAddr
pdSasAddr.description: Device SAS addresses. Comma separeted for multiple address

nonCoercedSize.name: nonCoercedSize
nonCoercedSize.description: Size(MB) after COD is reserved but before coercion

coercedSize.name: coercedSize
coercedSize.description: Size(MB) after COD is reserved and after coercion

enclDeviceId.name: enclDeviceId
enclDeviceId.description: Enclosure's device Id (in decimal); if device is not within enclosure value is -1

slotNumber.name: slotNumber
slotNumber.description: Slot number of this drive, if this Physical Drive is an enclosure then -1

pdOperationProgress.name: pdOperationProgress
pdOperationProgress.description: % Progress is %. e.g. Rebuild progress is 10%

pdAdpID.name: pdAdpID
pdAdpID.description: Controller id where this Physical Drive is attached

partnerDevId.name: partnerDevId
partnerDevId.description: If drive is in an enclosure with dual paths,This is Partner Device ID. In all other cases INVALID(-1)

oemCertified.name: oemCertified
oemCertified.description: Indicates whether device is certified(0) or not(1)

piType.name: piType
piType.description: SAS Protection Information Type .No SAS protection type used(0) ,SAS PI Type 1(1) ,SAS PI Type 2(2) ,SAS PI Type 3(3) ,Reserved SAS PI Type 4(4) ,Reserved SAS PI Type 5(5) ,Reserved SAS PI Type 6(6) ,Reserved SAS PI Type 7(7).

userDataBlockSize.name: userDataBlockSize
userDataBlockSize.description: Number of bytes of user data in LBA

cage.name: cage
cage.description: Current Cage that holds the SSD

location.name: location
location.description: Current location of SSD 0 - Upper, 1 - Lower

flashType.name: flashType
flashType.description: Flash Type being used (SLC / MLC / EMLC)

lifeCurveStatus.name: lifeCurveStatus
lifeCurveStatus.description: 100 - No throttling being done, 90 - SSD is being throttled

vdNumber.name: vdNumber
vdNumber.description: The present number of rows in the virtualDrive table.

vdTable.name: vdTable
vdTable.description: A List of Virtual Drive Entries containing Information/Properties about the virtualDrive.

vdEntry.name: vdEntry
vdEntry.description: An Entry in the virtualDrive Table.

size.name: size
size.description: Total size in MB of the drive

state.name: state
state.description: Virtual Drive state. Values: offline(0), partially_degraded(1), degraded(2), optimal(3)

defaultCachePolicy.name: defaultCachePolicy
defaultCachePolicy.description: Default cache policy settings. Values: direct_io(0), cached_io(1)

vdAccessPolicy.name: vdAccessPolicy
vdAccessPolicy.description: Access policy settings. Values: access_rw(0), access_read_only(2), access_blocked(3)

vdDiskCachePolicy.name: vdDiskCachePolicy
vdDiskCachePolicy.description: Physical disk cache policy. Values: enable(1), disable(2)

bgiState.name: bgiState
bgiState.description: BGI state on this VD. Values disable(1), enable(0)

prl.name: prl
prl.description: Primay raid level. Values: 0(RAID-0), 1(RAID-1), 3(RAID-3), 4(RAID-4), 5(RAID-5), 6(RAID-6),15(Single Disk or JBOD), 17(RAID-1E/10), 21(RAID-5E), 31(Concatenation),37(RAID-5EEE)

sRL.name: sRL
sRL.description: Secondary raid level. Values: 0(Stripped), 1(Mirrored), 2(Concatenated), 3(Spanned), -1(Not Supported for IR2)

spanDepth.name: spanDepth
spanDepth.description: Number of spans. If only one array then it is considered as 1 span

currentCachePolicy.name: currentCachePolicy
currentCachePolicy.description: Default cache policy settings. Values: direct_io(0), cached_io(1)

operationProgress.name: operationProgress
operationProgress.description: Progress % for operation x/ No operation in progress

vdAdpID.name: vdAdpID
vdAdpID.description: Controller id where this vd is present

vdSpanNumber.name: vdSpanNumber
vdSpanNumber.description: The present number of rows in the virtualDrive table.

vdSpanTable.name: vdSpanTable
vdSpanTable.description: A List of span Entries containing Information/Properties vd span.

vdSpanEntry.name: vdSpanEntry
vdSpanEntry.description: An Entry in the vdSpan Table.

spAdpId.name: spAdpId
spAdpId.description: Adapter where the span will be found

arrayNumber.name: arrayNumber
arrayNumber.description: The present number of rows in the array table.

arrayTable.name: arrayTable
arrayTable.description: A List of array Entries containing Information/Properties about the arrays.

arrayEntry.name: arrayEntry
arrayEntry.description: An Entry in the array Table.

arrNumDrives.name: arrNumDrives
arrNumDrives.description: Number of drives for this array

pdList.name: pdList
pdList.description: Space separated pd identification. e.g. {devID devID devID} etc

arrAdpId.name: arrAdpId
arrAdpId.description: Adapter where the array will be found

spareDevNumber.name: spareDevNumber
spareDevNumber.description: The present number of rows in the sparepool table.

spareTable.name: spareTable
spareTable.description: A List of sparepool Entries containing Information/Properties about the spare drive

spareEntry.name: spareEntry
spareEntry.description: An Entry in the sparepool Table.

spareType.name: spareType
spareType.description: Spare type. isDedicated(0/1)isRevertible(0/1)isEnclAffinity(0/1). 1 implies particular feature is enable and 0 represent feature is disable.

arrayCount.name: arrayCount
arrayCount.description: The number of arrays to which the PD can be dedicated

arrRef.name: arrRef
arrRef.description: Comma separated array ids. e.g. 2,4,5 etc

sprAdpId.name: sprAdpId
sprAdpId.description: Adapter where the spare will be found

enclosureNumber.name: enclosureNumber
enclosureNumber.description: The present number of rows in the enclosure table.

enclosureTable.name: enclosureTable
enclosureTable.description: A List of enclosure Entries containing Information/Properties about the enclosures in the system.

enclosureEntry.name: enclosureEntry
enclosureEntry.description: An Entry in the enclosure table.

isFault.name: isFault
isFault.description: Enclosure has entered a FAULT state or not. Values: false(0), true(1)

encAdpID.name: encAdpID
encAdpID.description: Adapter ID where this enclosure is connected

enclosureFanNumber.name: enclosureFanNumber
enclosureFanNumber.description: The present number of rows in the enclosure fan table.

enclosureFanTable.name: enclosureFanTable
enclosureFanTable.description: A List of fan Entries containing Information/Properties about the enclosureFan.

enclosureFanEntry.name: enclosureFanEntry
enclosureFanEntry.description: An Entry in the enclosureFan table.

enclosureId.name: enclosureId
enclosureId.description: Enclosure ID where the fan is attached

enclosureSlotNum.name: enclosureSlotNum
enclosureSlotNum.description: The present number of rows in the enclosure slot table.

enclosureSlotTable.name: enclosureSlotTable
enclosureSlotTable.description: A List of slot Entries containing Information/Properties about the enclosure slots.

enclosureSlotEntry.name: enclosureSlotEntry
enclosureSlotEntry.description: An Entry in the enclosureSlot table.

slotStatus.name: slotStatus
slotStatus.description: status of the device. Values: status-ok(1), status-critical(2), status-nonCritical(3), status-unrecoverable(4), status-not-installed(5), status-unknown(6), status-not-available(7)

enclosurePSNumber.name: enclosurePSNumber
enclosurePSNumber.description: The present number of rows in the enclosure fan table.

enclosurePSTable.name: enclosurePSTable
enclosurePSTable.description: A List of powerSupply Entries containing Information/Properties about the enclosure powerSupply

enclosurePSEntry.name: enclosurePSEntry
enclosurePSEntry.description: An Entry in the powerSupply table.

enclosureTSNumber.name: enclosureTSNumber
enclosureTSNumber.description: The present number of rows in the enclosure fan table.

enclosureTSTable.name: enclosureTSTable
enclosureTSTable.description: A List of TempSensor Entries containing Information/Properties about the enclosure TempSensor

enclosureTSEntry.name: enclosureTSEntry
enclosureTSEntry.description: An Entry in the adapter table.

enclosureAlarmNumber.name: enclosureAlarmNumber
enclosureAlarmNumber.description: The present number of rows in the enclosure fan table.

enclosureAlarmTable.name: enclosureAlarmTable
enclosureAlarmTable.description: A List of Alarm Entries containing Information/Properties about enclosure Alarms

enclosureAlarmEntry.name: enclosureAlarmEntry
enclosureAlarmEntry.description: An Entry in the enclosureAlarm table.

almEnclosureId.name: almEnclosureId
almEnclosureId.description: Enclosure id where the Alarm is attached

enclosureSIMNumber.name: enclosureSIMNumber
enclosureSIMNumber.description: The present number of rows in the enclosure fan table.

enclosureSIMTable.name: enclosureSIMTable
enclosureSIMTable.description: A List of SIM Entries containing Information/Properties about enclosure SIMs

enclosureSIMEntry.name: enclosureSIMEntry
enclosureSIMEntry.description: An Entry in the enclosureSIM table.

simEnclosureId.name: simEnclosureId
simEnclosureId.description: Enclosure id where the SIM is attached

simStatus.name: simStatus
simStatus.description: Number of Logical Drives Configured on this Adapter.

phyNumber.name: phyNumber
phyNumber.description: The present number of rows in the Phy table.

phyTable.name: phyTable
phyTable.description: A List of phy Entries containing Information/Properties about the sas topology in the system.

phyEntry.name: phyEntry
phyEntry.description: An Entry in the Phy table.

deviceIndex.name: deviceIndex
deviceIndex.description: Index of the device in tDeviceTable where the phy is attached

deviceType.name: deviceType
deviceType.description: Type of device attached to this phy NO_DEVICE = 0, IOC(1), EDGE_EXPANDER(2), FANOUT_EXPANDER(3),END_DEVICE(4)

phyID.name: phyID
phyID.description: The phy ID of the attached device

deviceOffset.name: deviceOffset
deviceOffset.description: The memory offset where the node of the device that is attached to this phy starts.

phyPos.name: phyPos
phyPos.description: Position of the Phy in device attached.

tDeviceNumber.name: tDeviceNumber
tDeviceNumber.description: The present number of rows in the topology Device table.

tDeviceTable.name: tDeviceTable
tDeviceTable.description: A List of device Entries containing Information/Properties about the sas topology in the system.

tDeviceEntry.name: tDeviceEntry
tDeviceEntry.description: An Entry in the tDevice table.

contID.name: contID
contID.description: Adapter ID where this device is attached

tParentIndex.name: tParentIndex
tParentIndex.description: Index of the parent device in the table where this device is connected. -1 if it root device.

tNumPhy.name: tNumPhy
tNumPhy.description: Total no of Phy present in this device

tSASAddr.name: tSASAddr
tSASAddr.description: Device SAS addresses. Comma separeted for multiple address

atAdpNumber.name: atAdpNumber
atAdpNumber.description: Adapter ID for which Trap is generated.

sensorOrSlot.name: sensorOrSlot
sensorOrSlot.description: Sensor Or Slot depending on the value of thr Flag

vdNum.name: vdNum
vdNum.description: Virtual Drive Target ID for which Trap is generated.

vdSeq.name: vdSeq
vdSeq.description: Virtual Drive Sequence no for which Trap is generated.

pdID.name: pdID
pdID.description: Device ID for which Trap is generated.

pdEncIndex.name: pdEncIndex
pdEncIndex.description: Enclosure index(0 means not within an enclosure) for which Trap is generated.

irAdpAlarmStateEnabled.name: irAdpAlarmStateEnabled
irAdpAlarmStateEnabled.description: Alarm has been enabled by user for Adapter $1

irAdpBGIRateChanged.name: irAdpBGIRateChanged
irAdpBGIRateChanged.description: Background initialization rate changed to $1 for Adapter $2

irAdpCacheDiscarded.name: irAdpCacheDiscarded
irAdpCacheDiscarded.description: Controller $1 cache discarded due to memory/battery problems

irAdpCacheRebootCantRecover.name: irAdpCacheRebootCantRecover
irAdpCacheRebootCantRecover.description: Unable to recover cache data due to configuration mismatch for Adapter $1

irAdpCacheRebootRecover.name: irAdpCacheRebootRecover
irAdpCacheRebootRecover.description: Cache data recovered successfully for Adapter $1
